description: Least nonnegative square root of 2 mod n for n in A057126.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
mathematica: A057126 = Prepend[ Select[ Range[300], Reduce[ Mod[2 - k^2, #] == 0, k, Integers] =!= False &], 1]; a[n_] := Min[ r /. {ToRules[ Reduce[ Mod[r^2 - 2, A057126[[n]]] == 0, r, Integers] /. C[1] -> 0]}]; a[1] = 0; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 53}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Sep 20 2012 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 01 2000
extensions: Corrected by T. D. Noe, Apr 19 2007 [The errors were caused by the faulty Maple command "mroot"]
